Text: HCCPS BOARD MEETING TIME CHANGE Cc of members of the board resulted in the majority stating that they prefer beginning the HCCPS Board Meetings at PM instead of PM The September meeting will begin at PM as planned then beginning in October the meetings will begin at PM Please note this change in your calendars Ernest Fruge President HCCPS Board
